first_para: Andrew Guy Tyrie (born 15 January 1957) is a British politician for the Conservative Party. He is the Member of Parliament (MP) for Chichester, and was first elected in the 1997 general election. He had previously been a Special Adviser at HM Treasury and is the current Chairman of the Treasury Select Committee, having taken up the role on 10 June 2010.

full.title: Andrew Tyrie
